text: Is it possible to fetch pages with urllib2 through a SOCKS proxy on a one socks server per opener basic?
I've seen the solution using setdefaultproxy method, but I need to have different socks in different openers.
So there is SocksiPy library, which works great, but it has to be used this way:

code:
import socks
import socket
socket.socket = socks.socksocket
import urllib2
socks.setdefaultproxy(socks.PROXY_TYPE_SOCKS5, "x.x.x.x", y)

text: That is, it sets the same proxy for ALL urllib2 requests.
How can I have different proxies for different openers?
